resources.string: Bogota is the capital of the Republic of Colombia and the main tourist destination in the country, because it has various activities and cultural heritages, It is home to major universities, and hosting international events.
Application developed by Daniel Ortiz Agudelo, student of telecommunications Engineering UdeA Ude@ APRIL 2016. Bogota Graphic population: Frank Ballesteros - DANE (National Department of Statistics).

DEMOGRAPHICS: Bogotá D.C. It is the capital city of Colombia, and it is currently the most populous country with 7,363,782 inhabitants for 2005 city, according with projections of results of the national census of 2005. It was founded in 1538 by Gonzalo Jimenez de Quesada.
CERRRO DE MONSERRATE: Carrera 2 E No. 21-48
